MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL60 and LL61  postcode areas of Gaerwen and Llanfair PG, affecting properties in a widespread area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 7:54 am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of trees on the overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12 Noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:51 am on 19th January, 2021.
